title: Student Medium Skin Tone
description: Represents a student with a medium skin tone, often used in contexts related to education, learning, graduation, or academic pursuits.
apple_vendor_description: The student emoji on Apple devices portrays a young individual with a warm, medium skin tone, exuding an aura of focused learning. Rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, they appear ready for academic pursuits, perhaps holding books or a pen, symbolizing education and intellectual growth. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, is a versatile representation of studying, school, and the pursuit of knowledge.
